### Research Facility
- Lab containing 15 automation science packs
- Currently researching logistics technology
- No power due to steam engine issues

ERROR TIPS

### Resource Gathering Issues
- Coal cannot be crafted as it's a raw resource that must be mined
- Stone cannot be crafted as it's a raw resource that must be mined
- When mining resources manually, ensure you have inventory space available

### Entity Placement and Management
- Verify required items are in inventory before attempting placement (e.g., burner inserter)
- When relocating or rebuilding structures, ensure proper cleanup of old entities
- Check entity existence before performing operations on them

### Crafting Issues
- Ensure recipes are properly unlocked before attempting to craft items
- Verify all required ingredients are available before crafting
- Handle recipe errors appropriately when crafting fails

### Fuel Management Issues
- Verify fuel availability in inventory before attempting to fuel entities
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices
- Ensure proper positioning when inserting fuel
- Set up sustainable fuel supply chains before expanding operations

### Resource Flow Issues
- Ensure proper alignment between mining drills and collection chests
- Verify drop positions align with collection containers
- Monitor collection chest contents regularly

### Entity State Verification
- Check entity existence before operations
- Monitor entity status changes and warnings
- Verify entity state before attempting operations
- Handle cases where entities may have been removed

### Power System Issues
- Steam engine not receiving electricity due to no fuel in boiler
- Monitor fluid connections between power system components
- Ensure proper fluid flow through pipe networks

### Inventory Management
- Check inventory contents before attempting operations
- Monitor inventory changes after operations
- Verify required items are available for placement
